module.name: register-beginner
module.label: Registration: Beginner
module.help: Use this tool to add Beginner Session information, view submissions and manage registrations. An email tool enables administrators to send messages to individuals or the group.

module.name: register-intermediate
module.label: Registration: Intermediate
module.help: Use this tool to add Beginner Session information, view submissions and manage registrations. An email tool enables administrators to send messages to individuals or the group.
